nodes.text: Dale Schott was co-director and storyboard artist for the animated Ewoks television series.

Schott was a regular staff member with Nelvana and worked on some of their most popular and well-regarded productions, including Babar, Rupert and Rock & Rule. He was a storyboard artist and animator for The Care Bears Movie and also provided storyboards for the popular comedic children's series Inspector Gadget.
Schott's most recent work includes writing an episode of the Babar spinoff Babar and the Adventures of Badou, as well as another children's animated series featuring an elephant, Ella the Elephant.
